text: Charles G Bowen was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He competed for England in the javelin at the 1934 British Empire Games in London and won the 1934 AAA Championships. ==Personal life== He served as a lieutenant with the Lancashire Fusiliers. ==References== Category:English male javelin throwers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1934 British Empire Games
title: Charles Bowen (athlete)
